name: Playbook for Mitigating Malicious PowerShell Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where a malicious PowerShell script was executed, resulting in the downloading of additional payloads.

action--2d2b3b21-87d4-4cb0-b938-cfcbf439.name: Terminate malicious PowerShell process
action--2d2b3b21-87d4-4cb0-b938-cfcbf439.description: Terminate any running PowerShell processes that may be executing the malicious script.

loop--f0116140-1be0-42d9-9440-61e320cdbd.name: Delete Malicious Files
loop--f0116140-1be0-42d9-9440-61e320cdbd.description: Repeat the deletion of malicious files until none are found.

action--b8fbb7fd-ec71-4ef9-a579-ddc7c4b0.name: Delete downloaded malicious files
action--b8fbb7fd-ec71-4ef9-a579-ddc7c4b0.description: Remove any downloaded malicious payloads on the system.

action--0e5c3eae-4086-4b0d-9b59-31e5cb65.name: Run full system antivirus scan
action--0e5c3eae-4086-4b0d-9b59-31e5cb65.description: Perform a comprehensive antivirus scan of the system to identify other potential threats.

action--3b6e0425-2250-4d7c-8eb4-3dcf6a76.name: Notify security team of incident
action--3b6e0425-2250-4d7c-8eb4-3dcf6a76.description: Send an alert to the security team about the detected incident.

commands.command: echo 'Incident detected on host-12, immediate action required' | mail -s 'Security Alert' security@organization.xyz
